chapters.title: Prologue: The First Sparks Fall
chapters.info: Amathera Aelfdene Casmir Lounault, p. 16 (15)—The Panarch of Tarabon. She has vanished, allegedly at Aes Sedai hands, according to Evanellein. In reality, Amathera was being held prisoner by sisters of the Black Ajah under Liandrin, and was rescued by Elayne and Nynaeve. They had her keep a low profile for several days so as not to be hurt by the mob outside the Panarch's Palace (since it is not all that far from “The Panarch is dead!” to “Death to the Panarch!”), then she returned to her position.
